Sentencas: In the present study, the lattice Boltzmann method (LBM) is employed to study the diffusion phenomenon in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with direct internal reforming (DIR).
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The main focus of this work is to correlate and estimate the diffusion coefficient through dimensionless numbers, i.e., Schmidt and Prandtl.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: This work tries to reveal the importance of reforming and electrochemical reactions on these dimensionless numbers in active and inactive zones.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: In addition, the effects of inlet velocity (Re number), steam-to-carbon ratio (S/C) of inlet flow, current density, and porosity were investigated to disclose their importance on diffusion phenomena.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: A lattice Boltzmann method is used for numerical simulation of diffusion phenomenon in porous media of anode.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Our results show that the Schmidt and the Prandtl numbers could be used for high precision estimation of the diffusion process in SOFC.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: It is also found that the molar ratio variation in hydrogen and water is highly effective since their diffusion characteristics are significantly different from other gases.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: By changing in operating parameters, the variation in the Prandtl number is much greater than the reforming reactions due to electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Our results indicate that the Schmidt number of hydrogen increases by 53%, and the Prandtl number decreases about 45% at the center of SOFC when the porosity decreases about 25%.
Titulo: A parametric study of the heat and mass diffusion dimensionless parameter in SOFC with DIR by lattice Boltzmann method
